title: [BUG] simple CURL example return nothing
body:
### System information
- **Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in MLflow)**: stock example
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: Linux 13254b722794 5.4.1-arch1-1 #1 SMP PREEMPT
- **MLflow installed from (source or binary)**: binary (pip)
- **MLflow version (run ``mlflow --version``)**: mlflow, version 1.4.0
- **Python version**: Python 3.7.3
- **npm version, if running the dev UI**: 
- **Exact command to reproduce**:
```
$ git clone git@github.com:mlflow/mlflow.git
...
$ root@13254b722794:/home/user/work# python sklearn_logistic_regression/train.py
/opt/conda/lib/python3.7/site-packages/sklearn/linear_model/logistic.py:432: FutureWarning: Default solver will be changed to 'lbfgs' in 0.22. Specify a solver to silence this warning.
  FutureWarning)
Score: 0.6666666666666666
Model saved in run f3c7eab482d84ea080e7232da50fcbcf
$ mlflow models serve --model-uri runs:/f3c7eab482d84ea080e7232da50fcbcf/model -h 0.0.0.0 -p 5000
2019/12/15 17:54:44 INFO mlflow.models.cli: Selected backend for flavor 'python_function'
2019/12/15 17:54:45 INFO mlflow.pyfunc.backend: === Running command 'source activate mlflow-41d4474c41caf84e922effe9e3fc9d76e7ffbf38 1>&2 && gunicorn --timeout=60 -b 0.0.0.0:5000 -w 1 ${GUNICORN_CMD_ARGS} -- mlflow.pyfunc.scoring_server.wsgi:app'
[2019-12-15 17:54:46 +0000] [1995] [INFO] Starting gunicorn 20.0.4
[2019-12-15 17:54:46 +0000] [1995] [INFO] Listening at: http://0.0.0.0:5000 (1995)
[2019-12-15 17:54:46 +0000] [1995] [INFO] Using worker: sync
[2019-12-15 17:54:46 +0000] [2008] [INFO] Booting worker with pid: 2008
$ curl -d '{"columns":[0],"index":[0,1],"data":[[1],[-1]]}' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' 127.0.0.1:5000/invocations
```

### Describe the problem
curl return nothing..neither errors.
